title: A New View of African Art
description: A freshly reconsidered and reinstalled gallery of African art welcomes four new acquisitions as well as 10 exceptional loans, presenting new perspectives on all the objects displayed.
short_description: A freshly reconsidered and reinstalled gallery of African art welcomes four new acquisitions as well as several exceptional loans, presenting new perspectives on the arts of Africa’s many regions and cultures.
department_display: Arts of Africa and the Americas
